attributes.action: Stricter regulations on the media and fake news
attributes.additional_details:
We are all sick to death of the media starting witch-hunts and starting mass panic all for the sake of a news story. 

Fake news needs to stop and the media held to account
attributes.background:
As the recent days have shown the media has the capability to cause mass panic and this isn't the first time they have done so. 
The media needs to be controlled and regulated more tightly in order to combat the fake news it produces. 
The media needs to be held to account for its consequences.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the content of media reporting.
